entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 8:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount possibly more than 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
